SELECT count(A.product_id) FROM product A left join product_allergy B on A.product_id=B.product_id where A.p_quantity!=0 AND A.is_delete=0
AND A.product_id NOT IN(SELECT product_id FROM product_allergy WHERE allergy_id in(${strallergy}))

select A.product_id productId,A.p_title title,A.p_name name,A.p_price price,A.p_quantity quantity,B.thumbnail thumbnail,A.sale_volumn volumn from product A left join product_img B ON A.product_id=B.product_id LEFT JOIN product_allergy C ON A.product_id=C.product_id where A.p_quantity!=0 and A.is_delete=0
AND A.product_id NOT IN(SELECT product_id FROM product_allergy WHERE allergy_id in(${strallergy}))
group by A.product_id order by A.sale_volumn desc,rand() limit 8

select COUNT(distinct A.product_id) from product A left join product_img B ON A.product_id=B.product_id LEFT JOIN product_category_relation C ON A.product_id=C.product_id LEFT JOIN product_allergy D ON A.product_id=D.product_id
WHERE C.cate_id=#{cate} and A.p_quantity!=0 and A.is_delete=0
AND A.product_id NOT IN(SELECT product_id FROM product_allergy WHERE allergy_id in(${strallergy}))
order by A.sale_volumn desc,RAND()
